00038 #define MET_PROGRAM_VERSION "1.0"
00039 #define MET_PROGRAM_NAME "apt-metabolizer"
00040 
00041 // Combines two alleles
00042 #define COMBINE_ALLELES(a1, a2) (a1 + "/" + a2)
00043 
00044 // Combine activities
00045 #define COMBINE_ACTIVITIES(a1, a2) (a1 + "/" + a2)
00046 
00047 // Unknown phenotype call
00048 #define UNKNOWN_PHENOTYPE "unknown"
00049 
00050 MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine::Reg MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine::reg;

00052 MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine * MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00053 {
00054         if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine::EngineName())
00055                 return (MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine *)engine;
00056         return NULL;
00057 }

00061         defineOptions();
00062 }

00066 }

00068 void MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine::Init()
00069 {
00070         metabolizerResults.clear();
00071         metabolizerPhenotypeMap.clear();
00072         phenotypeCallDescs.clear();
00073         userInformation.clear();
00074 }
00075 
00076 void MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine::ReadMetabolizerBinFile()
00077 {
00078         std::string gene;
00079         std::string allele1;
00080         std::string allele2;
00081         std::string phenotype;
00082         std::string activity1;
00083         std::string activity2;
00084         std::string allelePair;
00085         PhenotypeCallType pcall;
00086 
00087         // Open the file.
00088         affx::TsvFile tsv;
00089         std::string metabolizerBinFile = getOpt("metabolizer-file");
00090         if (tsv.open(metabolizerBinFile) != affx::TSV_OK)
00091         {
00092                 std::string err = "Unable to open the metabolizer bin file.";
00093                 Err::errAbort(err);
00094         }
00095 
00096         // Get the phenotype description and information
00097         phenotypeCallDescs.clear();
00098         tsv.getHeaderMatchingKeySubstr("PhenotypeCallDesc", phenotypeCallDescs);
00099         userInformation.clear();
00100         tsv.getHeaderMatchingKeySubstr("Info", userInformation);
00101 
00102         // Read the body of the file for the mapping data.
00103         tsv.bind(0, "gene", &gene, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00104         tsv.bind(0, "allele_1", &allele1, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00105         tsv.bind(0, "allele_2", &allele2, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00106         tsv.bind(0, "phenotype", &phenotype, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00107         tsv.bind(0, "activity_1", &activity1, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00108         tsv.bind(0, "activity_2", &activity2, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00109         while (tsv.nextLine() == affx::TSV_OK)
00110         {
00111                 if (metabolizerPhenotypeMap.find(gene) == metabolizerPhenotypeMap.end())
00112                         metabolizerPhenotypeMap[gene].clear();
00113 
00114                 allelePair = COMBINE_ALLELES(allele1, allele2);
00115                 pcall = PhenotypeCallType(phenotype, activity1, activity2);
00116                 if (metabolizerPhenotypeMap[gene].find(allelePair) != metabolizerPhenotypeMap[gene].end())
00117                 {
00118                         if (pcall.phenotype != metabolizerPhenotypeMap[gene][allelePair].phenotype)
00119                                 Err::errAbort("Duplicated allele pair with conflicting information: Gene:" + gene + ", Alleles:" + allele1 + "/" + allele2);
00120                 }
00121                 metabolizerPhenotypeMap[gene][allelePair] = pcall;
00122 
00123                 allelePair = COMBINE_ALLELES(allele2, allele1);
00124                 pcall = PhenotypeCallType(phenotype, activity2, activity1);
00125                 if (metabolizerPhenotypeMap[gene].find(allelePair) != metabolizerPhenotypeMap[gene].end())
00126                 {
00127                         if (pcall.phenotype != metabolizerPhenotypeMap[gene][allelePair].phenotype)
00128                                 Err::errAbort("Duplicated allele pair with conflicting information: Gene:" + gene + ", Alleles:" + allele2 + "/" + allele1);
00129                 }
00130                 metabolizerPhenotypeMap[gene][allelePair] = pcall;
00131         }
00132         tsv.close();
00133 }
00134 
00135 static int FindStartingAttributeColumnIndex(affx::TsvFile &tsv)
00136 {
00137         int n = tsv.getColumnCount(0);
00138         int idx = n;
00139         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00140         {
00141                 std::string name = tsv.getColumnName(0, i);
00142                 if (name == "Override Comment")
00143                 {
00144                         idx = i+1;
00145                         break;
00146                 }
00147         }
00148         return idx;
00149 }
00150 
00151 static void WriteHeader(MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine *eng, affx::TsvFile &tsv, int idx, std::ofstream &str)
00152 {
00153         // Output the header
00154         str << "# For research use only. Not for diagnostic purposes." << std::endl;
00155         str << "#%report-guid=" << affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid() << std::endl;
00156         str << "#%Program=" << MET_PROGRAM_NAME << std::endl;
00157         str << "#%Version=" << MET_PROGRAM_VERSION << std::endl;
00158         str << "#%Date=" << Util::getTimeStamp() << std::endl;
00159         str << "#%MetabolizerFile=" << eng->getOpt("metabolizer-file") << std::endl;
00160         str << "#%AlleleFile=" << eng->getOpt("allele-file") << std::endl;
00161         for (int i=0; i<(int)eng->PhenotypeCallDescs().size(); i++)
00162                 str << "#%PhenotypeCallDesc=" << eng->PhenotypeCallDescs()[i] << std::endl;
00163         for (int i=0; i<(int)eng->UserInformation().size(); i++)
00164                 str << "#%Info=" << eng->UserInformation()[i] << std::endl;
00165         str << "Index" << "\t"
00166                 << "CHP File" << "\t"
00167                 << "Gene" << "\t"
00168                 << "Phenotype Call" << "\t"
00169                 << "Gene Activity" << "\t"
00170                 << "Known Call" << "\t"
00171                 << "Unknown Call" << "\t"
00172                 << "Interpretation Code";
00173         int n = tsv.getColumnCount(0);
00174         for (int i=idx; i<n; i++)
00175         {
00176                 std::string name = tsv.getColumnName(0, i);
00177                 str << "\t" << name;
00178         }
00179         str << std::endl;
00180 }
00181 
00182 static void OpenAlleleFile(MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine *eng, affx::TsvFile &tsv, MetabolizerResultType &result, int &sampleIdx, int &ncols, std::vector<std::string> &sampleCols)
00183 {
00184         std::string translationTableFile = eng->getOpt("allele-file");
00185         tsv.m_optQuoteChar1 = 0;
00186         tsv.m_optQuoteChar2 = 0;
00187         if (tsv.open(translationTableFile) != affx::TSV_OK)
00188         {
00189                 std::string err = "Unable to open the metabolizer bin file.";
00190                 Err::errAbort(err);
00191         }
00192         tsv.bind(0, "Index", &result.index, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00193         tsv.bind(0, "CHP Filename", &result.chpFile, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00194         tsv.bind(0, "Gene", &result.gene, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00195         tsv.bind(0, "Known Call", &result.knownCall, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00196         tsv.bind(0, "Unknown Call", &result.unknownCall, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00197         tsv.bind(0, "Interpretation Code", &result.code, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00198         sampleIdx = FindStartingAttributeColumnIndex(tsv);
00199         ncols = tsv.getColumnCount(0);
00200         sampleCols.resize(ncols-sampleIdx);
00201         for (int i=sampleIdx; i<ncols; i++)
00202                 tsv.bind(0, i, &sampleCols[i-sampleIdx], affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00203 }
00204 
00205 static void OpenResultFile(MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine *eng, std::ofstream &str)
00206 {
00207         std::string outputFile = eng->getOpt("output-file");
00208         if (outputFile.empty() == false)
00209         {
00210                 str.open(outputFile.c_str(), std::ios::out);
00211                 if (!str)
00212                 {
00213                         std::string err = "Unable to write to the output file: " + outputFile;
00214                         Err::errAbort(err);
00215                 }
00216         }
00217 }
00218 
00219 static void ModifyIndex(std::string &index)
00220 {
00221         size_t idx = index.rfind('-');
00222         if (idx != std::string::npos)
00223                 index = index.substr(0, idx);
00224 }
00225 
00226 static void WriteResult(std::ofstream &str, MetabolizerResultType &result, int sampleIdx, int ncols, std::vector<std::string> &sampleCols)
00227 {
00228         str << result.index << "\t"
00229                 << result.chpFile << "\t"
00230                 << result.gene << "\t"
00231                 << result.finalPhenotype << "\t"
00232                 << result.finalActivity << "\t"
00233                 << result.knownCall << "\t"
00234                 << result.unknownCall << "\t"
00235                 << result.code;
00236         for (int i=sampleIdx; i<ncols; i++)
00237                 str << "\t" << sampleCols[i-sampleIdx];
00238         str << std::endl;
00239 }
00240 
00241 void MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine::ProcessAlleleTranslationFile()
00242 {
00243         // Open the file and bind to the required columns.
00244         affx::TsvFile tsv;
00245         MetabolizerResultType result;
00246         int sampleIdx;
00247         int ncols;
00248         std::vector<std::string> sampleCols;
00249         OpenAlleleFile(this, tsv, result, sampleIdx, ncols, sampleCols);
00250 
00251         // Open the results file for writing
00252         std::ofstream str;
00253         OpenResultFile(this, str);
00254         if (str)
00255                 WriteHeader(this, tsv, sampleIdx, str);
00256 
00257         // Process each line of the translation file.
00258         std::map<std::string, bool> geneFound;
00259         std::string chp;
00260         while (tsv.nextLine() == affx::TSV_OK)
00261         {
00262                 result.finalPhenotype.clear();
00263                 result.phenotypes.clear();
00264                 result.finalActivity.clear();
00265                 result.activities.clear();
00266 
00267                 // Skip any genes not found in the translation map.
00268                 if (metabolizerPhenotypeMap.find(result.gene) == metabolizerPhenotypeMap.end())
00269                         continue;
00270 
00271                 // Check if the gene of the current CHP file was found. If already processed then skip the line since
00272                 // the allele calls are the same for the repeated lines.
00273                 if (chp != result.chpFile)
00274                         geneFound.clear();
00275                 chp = result.chpFile;
00276                 if (geneFound.find(result.gene) != geneFound.end())
00277                         continue;
00278                 geneFound[result.gene] = true;
00279 
00280                 // Modify the index (strip off allele call)
00281                 ModifyIndex(result.index);
00282 
00283                 // Parse each diplotype and process it
00284                 std::vector<std::string> calls;
00285                 Util::chopString(result.knownCall, ',', calls);
00286                 for (std::vector<std::string>::iterator it=calls.begin(); it!=calls.end(); it++)
00287                 {
00288                         std::string &call = *it;
00289                         std::string activities = "";
00290                         std::string phenotype = UNKNOWN_PHENOTYPE;
00291                         if (metabolizerPhenotypeMap[result.gene].find(call) != metabolizerPhenotypeMap[result.gene].end())
00292                         {
00293                                 phenotype = metabolizerPhenotypeMap[result.gene][call].phenotype;
00294                                 activities = COMBINE_ACTIVITIES(metabolizerPhenotypeMap[result.gene][call].activity1, metabolizerPhenotypeMap[result.gene][call].activity2);
00295                         }
00296                         result.phenotypes.push_back(phenotype);
00297                         result.activities.push_back(activities);
00298                 }
00299 
00300                 // Compute the final call.
00301                 if (result.phenotypes.size() == 0)
00302                 {
00303                         result.finalPhenotype = UNKNOWN_PHENOTYPE;
00304                         result.finalActivity = "";
00305                 }
00306                 else if (result.phenotypes.size() == 1)
00307                 {
00308                         result.finalPhenotype = result.phenotypes[0];
00309                         result.finalActivity = result.activities[0];
00310                 }
00311                 else
00312                 {
00313                         bool allSame = true;
00314                         std::string first;
00315                         std::string all;
00316                         std::string firstAct;
00317                         std::string allAct;
00318                         for (int i=0; i<(int)result.phenotypes.size(); i++)
00319                         {
00320                                 std::string p = result.phenotypes[i];
00321                                 std::string a = result.activities[i];
00322                                 if (first.empty() == true)
00323                                 {
00324                                         first = p;
00325                                         firstAct = a;
00326                                 }
00327                                 else if (first != p)
00328                                 {
00329                                         allSame = false;
00330                                 }
00331 
00332                                 if (all.empty() == true)
00333                                 {
00334                                         all = p;
00335                                         allAct = a;
00336                                 }
00337                                 else
00338                                 {
00339                                         all += "," + p;
00340                                         allAct += "," + a;
00341                                 }
00342                         }
00343                         result.finalPhenotype = (allSame == true ? first : all);
00344                         result.finalActivity = (allSame == true ? firstAct : allAct);
00345                 }
00346                 metabolizerResults.push_back(result);
00347 
00348                 // Output the results
00349                 if (str)
00350                         WriteResult(str, result, sampleIdx, ncols, sampleCols);
00351         }
00352         if (str)
00353                 str.close();
00354         tsv.close();
00355 }
00356 
00357 void MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine::runImp()
00358 {
00359         Init();
00360         ReadMetabolizerBinFile();
00361         ProcessAlleleTranslationFile();
00362         CreateMd5File();
00363 }
00364 
00365 void MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine::CreateMd5File()
00366 {
00367         std::string alleleFile = getOpt("allele-file");
00368         std::string outputMetabolizerFile = getOpt("output-file");
00369         std::string md5file = getOpt("md5-file");
00370         std::string salt = getOpt("salt");
00371         std::string ttSum;
00372         std::string mbSum;
00373         affx::md5sum md5;
00374 
00375         // Check if the file has been set.
00376         if (md5file.empty() == true)
00377                 return;
00378 
00379         // Store the MD5's in a file.
00380         std::ofstream md5out(md5file.c_str(), ios::out);
00381         md5out << "File\tMD5" << std::endl;
00382         if (alleleFile.empty() == false)
00383         {
00384                 md5.ofFile(alleleFile, ttSum, salt);
00385                 md5out << Fs::basename(alleleFile) << "\t" << ttSum << std::endl;
00386         }
00387         if (outputMetabolizerFile.empty() == false)
00388         {
00389                 md5.ofFile(outputMetabolizerFile, mbSum, salt);
00390                 md5out << Fs::basename(outputMetabolizerFile) << "\t" << mbSum << std::endl;
00391         }
00392         md5out.close();
00393 }
00394 
00395 void MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine::defineOptions()
00396 {
00397         defineOptionSection("Inputs");
00398         defineOption("", "allele-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00399                                         "The file containing the allele calls", "");
00400         defineOption("", "metabolizer-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00401                                          "The metabolizer bin file for translating allele calls to metabolizer phenotypes", "");
00402         defineOption("", "salt", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00403                                          "The salt value to add to the MD5s.", "salt");
00404         defineOptionSection("Outputs");
00405         defineOption("", "output-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00406                                          "The output file for the metabolizer bin phenotypes", "");
00407         defineOption("", "md5-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00408                                          "The output file to store the MD5 values.", "");
00409 }
00410 
00411 void MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine::checkOptionsImp()
00412 {
00413         setLibFileOpt("metabolizer-file");
00414 
00415         std::string metabolizerBinFile = getOpt("metabolizer-file");
00416         std::string translationTableFile = getOpt("allele-file");
00417 
00418         if (metabolizerBinFile.empty() == true)
00419                 Err::errAbort("You must specify the metabolizer bin matrix file.");
00420 
00421         if (Fs::exists(metabolizerBinFile) == false)
00422                 Err::errAbort("The specified metabolizer bin matrix file does not exist.");
00423 
00424         if (translationTableFile.empty() == true)
00425                 Err::errAbort("You must specify the translation table file.");
00426 
00427         if (Fs::exists(translationTableFile) == false)
00428                 Err::errAbort("The specified translation table file does not exist.");
00429 }
